name: BMM_MODEL_METADATA
documentation: Core properties of `BMM_MODEL`, may be used in a serial representation as well, such as `P_BMM_SCHEMA`.

rm_publisher.name: rm_publisher
rm_publisher.documentation: Publisher of model expressed in the schema.

rm_release.name: rm_release
rm_release.documentation: Release of model expressed in the schema as a 3-part numeric, e.g. "3.1.0" .
